attributes.action: make it illeagal for bus drivers on servis to drive no more than four and a half hours without a three quaters of an hour break
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this present time service bus drivers can drive up to five and a half hours without a break, which in this day and age is a danger,not just to the drivers health but also to the travelling public
